assignments.name: Add_to_Final_Matching_Serialised_Products
assignments.label: Add to Final Matching Serialised Products

assignments.name: Add_to_Matching_Serialised_Product_Id_Collection
assignments.label: Add to Matching Serialised Product Id Collection

assignments.description: Adds the created Serialised Product to record collection.
assignments.name: Add_to_Record_Collection
assignments.label: Add to Record Collection

assignments.description: Assigns true to the competent user only checkbox variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Competent_Checkbox
assignments.label: Assign Competent Checkbox

assignments.description: Assigns the true/false values that user selected for safety check dates on the Product creation.
assignments.name: Assign_Final_Compliance_Information
assignments.label: Assign Final Compliance Information

assignments.description: Assigns the Id of the updated record to the final Product Id record.
assignments.name: Assign_Id_to_finalProductId_variable
assignments.label: Assign Id to finalProductId variable

assignments.description: Resets the variable back to null for duplicate serial number.
assignments.name: Reset_Serial_Number_Variable
assignments.label: Reset Serial Number Variable

decisions.description: Decision to see if user has confirmed to add additional Serialised Products.
decisions.name: Add_More_Items_Check
decisions.label: Add More Items Check

decisions.description: Checks the current location entered is valid with the chosen item status.
decisions.name: Check_Locations_Entered_are_Valid
decisions.label: Check Locations Entered are Valid

decisions.description: Checks the Product user invoked the flow from is active.
decisions.name: Check_Product_Is_Active
decisions.label: Check Product Is Active

decisions.description: Checks to see if duplicate Energy Network ID was found.
decisions.name: Duplicate_ENID
decisions.label: Duplicate ENID?

decisions.description: Checks to see if user wants to add more matching items.
decisions.name: More_Matching_Items
decisions.label: More Matching Items?

decisions.description: Checks if user did not select the Product and chose to create a new Product in the system.
decisions.name: New_Product_Needed
decisions.label: New Product Needed?

decisions.description: Checks if all permission set Ids were located, and also if the user has a permission set assignment for any of the permission sets.
decisions.name: Permission_Set_Assignment_Check
decisions.label: Permission Set Assignment Check

decisions.description: Checks what category of product was entered in order to decide if the equipment is competent user only.
decisions.name: Product_Category_Check
decisions.label: Product Category Check

rules.name: Competent_Category_Alternate
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)
rules.label: Competent Category Alternate

decisions.description: Checks if a Product Item was found to link to the Serialised Product.
decisions.name: Product_Item_Found
decisions.label: Product Item Found?

decisions.description: Checks to see if the flow was invoked from a quick action or global action.
decisions.name: Quick_Action_or_Global_Action
decisions.label: Quick Action or Global Action?

decisions.description: Checks to see if user chose to re-activate.
decisions.name: Reactivate
decisions.label: Reactivate?

decisions.description: Checks to see if product name or manufacturer was left blank, amends search for products accordingly.
decisions.name: Search_Decision
decisions.label: Search Decision

Flow.description: Flow to allow users to onboard new Products/Serialised Products in a guided path, to be used with Compliance Stores solution.
Flow.label: Compliance Stores - Product Onboarding

recordCreates.description: Create Records to create a new Product using information entered by the User.
recordCreates.name: Create_New_Product_Record
recordCreates.label: Create New Product Record

recordCreates.description: Create Records to generate Product Item linked to chosen location/product.
recordCreates.name: Create_Product_Item_Record
recordCreates.label: Create Product Item Record

recordCreates.description: Create Records to generate Serialised Product record.
recordCreates.name: Create_Serialised_Product
recordCreates.label: Create Serialised Product

recordCreates.description: Create Records to generate Serialised Product record with matching details.
recordCreates.name: Create_Serialised_Product_Matching_Details
recordCreates.label: Create Serialised Product

recordLookups.description: Get Records to check that no other Serialised Products for Compliance Stores already exists with the Energy Network ID.

recordLookups.name: Check_If_Serial_Number_Exists_Matching_Details
recordLookups.label: Check If Serial Number Exists

recordLookups.description: Get Records to see if Product Item exists for the Product/Owner/Location.

recordLookups.label: Find Product Item

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find all base locations for user selection.
recordLookups.name: Get_Base_Location_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Base Location Records

recordLookups.description: Gets the current location record as per user selection
recordLookups.name: Get_Chosen_Current_Location_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Chosen Current Location Record

recordLookups.description: Get Records element to find Record Type of Location object for Compliance Stores.
recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Stores_Location_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Stores Location Record Type

recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Stores_Product_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Stores Product Record Type

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find Serialised Product record type Id.
recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Stores_Serialised_Product_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Stores Serialised Product Record Type

recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Team_Permission_Set_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Team Permission Set Id

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find all current locations for user selection.
recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Location_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Current Location Records

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find final Product details to link to Serialised Product.
recordLookups.name: Get_Final_Product_Details

recordLookups.name: Get_Matching_Product_Records_Product_Name_Only
recordLookups.label: Get Matching Product Records (Product Name Only)

recordLookups.description: Gets the Serialised Product generated in order to displayon the confirmation screen.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialised_Product_Details
recordLookups.label: Get Serialised Product Details

recordLookups.name: Get_Site_Manager_Permission_Set_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Site Manager Permission Set Id

recordUpdates.description: Updates the Product record flow was invoked from to active.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Product_Record
recordUpdates.label: Update Product Record

screens.description: allows user to add new Serialised Products to the newly created Product record.
screens.name: Add_Serialised_Product_Screen_New_Product
screens.label: Add Serialised Product

fields.name: NewSerialisedProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Serialised Product Information


Enter the details required to create the new equipment in the system:

fields.name: MultisetExplanationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: If this piece of equipment is part of a multiset and you wish to record the pieces individually, please select multiset and enter Parent Energy Network ID:

validationRule.errorMessage: Expected return date must be greater than or equal to today.

value.stringValue: Choose the location this equipment is based from
Choose where the equipment currently is

screens.description: Screen to allow users to enter additional Product information.
screens.name: Additional_Product_Creation_Screen
screens.label: Additional Product Creation Screen

fields.name: AdditionalInfoDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Additional Information


Enter any extra details below:

fields.name: Type_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter the equipment type for additional information.

fields.name: Description_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a description for the equipment for additional information.

fields.name: Rating_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a description for the equipment for additional information.

fields.name: Voltage_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a relevant voltage for the equipment for additional information

fields.name: Safe_Working_Load
fields.helpText: Enter a safe working load for the equipment for additional information.

fields.name: Colour_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a colour for the equipment for additional information.

screens.description: Screen to allow users to update Product information.
screens.name: Additional_Product_Update_Screen
screens.label: Additional Product Update Screen

fields.name: Copy_1_of_AdditionalInfoDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Additional Information


Update any of the extra details for the Product below:

screens.description: Screen for user to create a new Product for the Serialised Products to be related to.
screens.name: Basic_Product_Creation_Screen
screens.label: Basic Product Creation

fields.name: CreateNewProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Product Details


Enter the basic details to onboard the equipment in the system:

fields.name: Product_Name_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a name for your Product.

fields.name: Manufacturer_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a manufacturer for the equipment.

fields.name: Model_Entry
fields.helpText: Enter a model name/number for the equipment.

fields.name: Category_Entry
fields.helpText: Choose the category for this piece of equipment.

screens.description: Screen for users to confirm which safety dates apply to this product. Ensures Serialised Products have correct validation for compliance purposes.
screens.name: Compliance_Product_Creation_Screen
screens.label: Compliance Product Creation

fields.name: ComplianceDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Compliance Information


Please tick any of the below dates which apply to this Product for Compliance purposes:

fields.name: Do_Not_Use_After_Checkbox
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Do Not Use After date.

fields.name: Replacement_Checkbox
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Replacement date.

fields.name: Calibration_Checkbox
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Calibration Due date.

fields.name: Service_Checkbox
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Service Due date.

fields.name: Insurance_Inspection_Checkbox
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Insurance Inspection Due date.

screens.description: Screen for users to confirm which safety dates now apply to this product. Ensures Serialised Products have correct validation for compliance purposes.
screens.name: Compliance_Product_Update
screens.label: Compliance Product Update

fields.name: UpdateComplianceDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Compliance Information


Please re-confirm which safety dates apply to this Product:

fields.name: Do_Not_Use_After_Checkbox_Update
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Do Not Use After date.

fields.name: Replacement_Checkbox_Update
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Replacement date.

fields.name: Calibration_Checkbox_Update
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Calibration Due date.

fields.name: Service_Checkbox_Update
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Service Due date.

fields.name: Insurance_Inspection_Checkbox_Update
fields.helpText: This means the Product is required to have a Insurance Inspection Due date.

fields.name: CheckExistingProductsDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please note, if you change these requirements you will need to review existing equipment to ensure these dates are populated.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the Serialised Product has been generated.
screens.name: Confirmation_Creation_Screen
screens.label: Confirmation Creation Screen

fields.name: SameDetailsDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Select the below box if you want to add another item with the exact same details (status/location/dates).

screens.description: Confirms to user they selected to both create a new product and use existing.
screens.name: Dual_Selection_Screen
screens.label: Dual Selection Screen

fields.name: DualSelectionDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You chose to both create a new Product and to use the found existing Product. Please search again and only choose one option.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the Energy Network ID entered is already registered in the system.
screens.name: Duplicate_Energy_Networks_ID_Matching_Details
screens.label: Duplicate Energy Networks ID

fields.name: DuplicateEnidDisplayTextMatchingDetails
fields.fieldText: The Energy Networks ID you have entered is already registered in the system. Please go back and amend, or alternatively choose to finish and search for the duplicated record.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the Energy Network ID entered is already registered in the system.
screens.name: Duplicate_Energy_Networks_ID_Screen
screens.label: Duplicate Energy Networks ID

fields.name: DuplicateEnidDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The Energy Networks ID you have entered is already registered in the system. Please go back and amend, or alternatively choose to finish and search for the duplicated record.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run the flow.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Set_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Set Check Screen

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to onboard new equipment.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for an available item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Available_Location_Screen
screens.label: Incorrect Available Location

fields.name: IncorrectAvailableLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: If the status of the equipment is available, it must be stored in its base location. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for an away item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Away_Location
screens.label: Incorrect Away Location

fields.name: IncorrectAwayLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: If the status of the equipment is Away for Calibration/Away For Repair, it must be stored in a EXTERNAL CALIBRATION/REPAIR. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for a non quarantined item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Base_Quarantine_Location
screens.label: Incorrect Base Quarantine Location

fields.name: ncorrectBaseQuarantineLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You've chosen a quarantine location that is not linked to the base location. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for a booked out item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Booked_Out_Location_Screen
screens.label: Incorrect Booked Out Location

fields.name: IncorrectBookedOutLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: If the status of the equipment is booked out, it must be stored in a user location. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for a quarantined item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Non_Quarantine_Location
screens.label: Incorrect Non Quarantine Location

fields.name: IncorrectNonQuarantineLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You've chosen a quarantine status but the item is not in a quarantine location. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for a non quarantined item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Quarantine_Location
screens.label: Incorrect Quarantine Location

fields.name: IncorrectQuarantineLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You've chosen a quarantine location but the status of the item is not in quarantine. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to users they've chosen an incorrect combination on the previous screen.
screens.name: Incorrect_Selection_Following_Screen
screens.label: Incorrect Selection Following Search

fields.name: IncorrectNoneSelectionSearchDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You've not selected an existing Product or chosen to create a new Product. Please go back and make a valid selection.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to users they've chosen an incorrect combination on the previous screen.
screens.name: Incorrect_Selection_Screen
screens.label: Incorrect Selection

fields.name: IncorrectDualSelectionDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You've chosen to both re-activate and create a new product. Please go back to select one option only.

fields.name: IncorrectNoneSelectionDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You've chosen to neither re-activate or create a new product. Please go back to select an option.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the selected location for a stored item is invalid.
screens.name: Incorrect_Storage_Location_Screen
screens.label: Incorrect Storage Location

fields.name: IncorrectStorageLocationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: If the status of the equipment is storage, it must be stored in a storage location. Please go back and amend the details.

screens.description: User can enter additional network ID with matching details previously entered.
screens.name: Matching_Details_Entry_Screen
screens.label: Matching Details Entry Screen

fields.name: AdditionalMirroredItemDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please enter the Energy Network ID you wish to create with matching details:

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Locations is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Location_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Location Record Type

fields.name: MissingLocationRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot onboard new equipment at this time. Please advise the system of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Location object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the system is missing permission sets, these need to be uploaded before the flow can be ran.
screens.name: Missing_Permission_Sets_Screen
screens.label: Missing Permission Sets Screen

fields.name: MissingPermissionSetsDisplay
fields.fieldText:
There are missing permissions in the system to check you are authorised. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


One of the below custom permissions are missing in the Salesforce system:


  • Compliance Team
  • Site Manager

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Products is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Product_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Product Record Type

fields.name: MissingProductRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot onboard new equipment at this time. Please advise the system of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Serialised Products is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Serialised_Product_Record_Type_Screen
screens.label: Missing Serialised Product Record Type

fields.name: MissingSerialisedProductRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot onboard new equipment at this time. Please advise the system of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Serialised Product object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user they have not entered a Product Name or Manufacturer to search the system.
screens.name: No_Product_Name_Manufacturer_Screen
screens.label: No Product Name/Manufacturer Screen

fields.name: NoProductNameManufacturerDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You have not entered a Product Name or Manufacturer for search. Please go back and enter the details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the Product is inactive.
screens.name: Product_Inactive_Screen
screens.label: Product Inactive

fields.name: InactiveProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText: This Product is inactive, do you want to re-activate?

screens.description: Allows users to choose the Product to use, or alternatively select to create a new Product.
screens.name: Product_Selection_Screen
screens.label: Product Selection

fields.name: ChooseProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText: See below the Products found using the name/manufacturer provided, if none match please select to create a new Product:

screens.description: Allows user to search for the Product which may exist in the system.
screens.name: Search_Existing_Product_Screen
screens.label: Search Existing Product

fields.name: SearchProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Please search for the equipment to check if this already exists in the system.


If none are found, you will be directed to create a new Product.

screens.description: Screen for users to enter Compliance Information.
screens.name: Serialised_Product_Compliance_Information
screens.label: Serialised Product Compliance Information

fields.name: SerialisedProductComplianceInfoDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Enter the below information for Compliance purposes:

Date must be greater than or equal to today.
